attributes.action: ban bomb bags, water bombs and other such nuisances
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: 3 times in the last seven days I have had bomb bags put through my letter box. Not only is this a nuisance it is also stressful and makes a mess. In my last house I had problems with water bombs on a regular basis. If shops are banned from selling them children cannot use them for anti-social behaviour.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
